title: E285 An Emergency Bag Escape Room and a Pantsless Recording
description:
Welcome to episode 285, where Christine is changing diapers by lantern light! This week Em does a double feature rodent cryptid round up with the tales of the Afanc and the Lavellan. Then Christine covers the tragic and redemptive story of Lisa McVey. And are all cryptids queer? And that's why we drink!

Don't forget to get tickets to our 2nd Annual Cryptids Unscripted Poetry Slam and Charity Auction! momenthouse.com/cryptidsunscripted
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer, Eva Gross)
